pokemon.name: BULBASAUR
pokemon.description: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

pokemon.name: IVYSAUR
pokemon.description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

pokemon.name: VENUSAUR
pokemon.description: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokemon.

pokemon.name: CHARMANDER
pokemon.description: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.

pokemon.name: CHARMELEON
pokemon.description: In the rocky mountains where CHARMELEON live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

pokemon.name: CHARIZARD
pokemon.description: It is said that CHARIZARD's fire burns hotter if it has experienced harsh battles.

pokemon.name: SQUIRTLE
pokemon.description: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

pokemon.name: WARTORTLE
pokemon.description: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

pokemon.name: BLASTOISE
pokemon.description: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

pokemon.name: CATERPIE
pokemon.description: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

pokemon.name: METAPOD
pokemon.description: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

pokemon.name: BUTTERFREE
pokemon.description: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

pokemon.name: WEEDLE
pokemon.description: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.

pokemon.name: KAKUNA
pokemon.description: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

pokemon.name: BEEDRILL
pokemon.description: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

pokemon.name: PIDGEY
pokemon.description: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

pokemon.name: PIDGEOTTO
pokemon.description: It flies over its wide territory in search of prey, downing it with its highly developed claws.

pokemon.name: PIDGEOT
pokemon.description: By flapping its wings with all its might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of wind capable of bending tall trees.

pokemon.name: RATTATA
pokemon.description: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.

pokemon.name: RATICATE
pokemon.description: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.

pokemon.name: SPEAROW
pokemon.description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

pokemon.name: FEAROW
pokemon.description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

pokemon.name: EKANS
pokemon.description: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

pokemon.name: ARBOK
pokemon.description: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

pokemon.name: PIKACHU
pokemon.description: It lives in forests with others. It stores Electrity in the pouches on its cheeks.

pokemon.name: RAICHU
pokemon.description: It turns aggressive if it has too much Electrity in its body. It discharges power through its tail.

pokemon.name: SANDSHREW
pokemon.description: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

pokemon.name: SANDSLASH
pokemon.description: It curls up, then rolls into foes with its back. Its sharp spines inflict severe damage.

pokemon.name: NIDORAN
pokemon.description: While it does not prefer to fight, even one drop of the poison it secretes from barbs can be fatal.

pokemon.name: NIDORINA
pokemon.description: When it senses danger, it raises all the barbs on its body. These barbs grow slower than NIDORINO's.

pokemon.name: NIDOQUEEN
pokemon.description: Its entire body is armored with hard scales. It will protect the young in its burrow with its life.

pokemon.name: NIDORAN
pokemon.description: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.

pokemon.name: NIDORINO
pokemon.description: It has a violent disposition and stabs foes with its horn, which oozes poison upon impact.

pokemon.name: NIDOKING
pokemon.description: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

pokemon.name: CLEFAIRY
pokemon.description: Thought to live with others on quiet mountains, it is popular for its adorable nature.

pokemon.name: CLEFABLE
pokemon.description: Rarely seen by people, it is said to be drawn by the full moon to play at deserted lakes.

pokemon.name: VULPIX
pokemon.description: It controls balls of fire. As it grows, its six tails split from their tips to make more tails.

pokemon.name: NINETALES
pokemon.description: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

pokemon.name: JIGGLYPUFF
pokemon.description: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

pokemon.name: WIGGLYTUFF
pokemon.description: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

pokemon.name: ZUBAT
pokemon.description: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.

pokemon.name: GOLBAT
pokemon.description: It loves the blood of humans and Pokemon. It flies around at night in search of neck veins.

pokemon.name: ODDISH
pokemon.description: It often plants its root feet in the ground during the day and sows seeds as it walks about at night.

pokemon.name: GLOOM
pokemon.description: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.

pokemon.name: VILEPLUME
pokemon.description: Its petals are the largest in the world. As it walks, it scatters extremely allergenic pollen.

pokemon.name: PARAS
pokemon.description: Mushrooms named tochukaso grow on its back. They grow along with the host PARAS.

pokemon.name: PARASECT
pokemon.description: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls PARASECT. It scatters poisonous spores.

pokemon.name: VENONAT
pokemon.description: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

pokemon.name: VENOMOTH
pokemon.description: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.

pokemon.name: DIGLETT
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.

pokemon.name: DUGTRIO
pokemon.description: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.

pokemon.name: MEOWTH
pokemon.description: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.

pokemon.name: PERSIAN
pokemon.description: A very haughty Pokemon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.

pokemon.name: PSYDUCK
pokemon.description: If its usual headache worsens, it starts exhibiting odd powers. It can't remember doing so, however.

pokemon.name: GOLDUCK
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives in lakes. It swims faster than any human swimming champion.

pokemon.name: MANKEY
pokemon.description: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

pokemon.name: PRIMEAPE
pokemon.description: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.

pokemon.name: GROWLITHE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon with a loyal nature. It will remain motionless until it is given an order by its Trainer.

pokemon.name: ARCANINE
pokemon.description: Its proud and regal appearance has captured the hearts of people since long ago.

pokemon.name: POLIWAG
pokemon.description: Its skin is so thin, its internal organs are visible. It has trouble walking on its newly grown feet.

pokemon.name: POLIWHIRL
pokemon.description: The spiral pattern on its belly subtly undulates. Staring at it gradually causes drowsiness.

pokemon.name: POLIWRATH
pokemon.description: With its extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.

pokemon.name: ABRA
pokemon.description: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.

pokemon.name: KADABRA
pokemon.description: If one is nearby, an eerie shadow appears on TV screens. Seeing the shadow is said to bring bad luck.

pokemon.name: ALAKAZAM
pokemon.description: Its superb memory lets it recall everything it has experienced from birth. Its IQ exceeds 5,000.

pokemon.name: MACHOP
pokemon.description: It hefts a GRAVELER repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

pokemon.name: MACHOKE
pokemon.description: MACHOKE's boundless power is very dangerous, so it wears a belt that suppresses its energy.

pokemon.name: MACHAMP
pokemon.description: It punches with its four arms at blinding speed. It can launch 1,000 punches in two seconds.

pokemon.name: BELLSPROUT
pokemon.description: It prefers hot and humid environments. It is quick at capturing prey with its vines.

pokemon.name: WEEPINBELL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that appears to be a plant. It captures unwary prey by dousing them with a toxic powder.

pokemon.name: VICTREEBEL
pokemon.description: It pools in its mouth a fluid with a honeylike scent, which is really an acid that dissolves anything.

pokemon.name: TENTACOOL
pokemon.description: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.

pokemon.name: TENTACRUEL
pokemon.description: With 80 tentacles for ensnaring victims, it prevents escape until the prey is weakened by poison.

pokemon.name: GEODUDE
pokemon.description: Many live on mountain trails and remain half buried while keeping an eye on climbers.

pokemon.name: GRAVELER
pokemon.description: GRAVELER make their homes on sheer cliff faces by gouging out numerous horizontal holes.

pokemon.name: GOLEM
pokemon.description: It sheds its hide once a year. Its boulderlike body is so tough, even dynamite can't harm it.

pokemon.name: PONYTA
pokemon.description: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.

pokemon.name: RAPIDASH
pokemon.description: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.

pokemon.name: SLOWPOKE
pokemon.description: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.

pokemon.name: SLOWBRO
pokemon.description: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

pokemon.name: MAGNEMITE
pokemon.description: The units at its sides generate electromagnetic waves that keep it airborne. It feeds on Electrity.

pokemon.name: MAGNETON
pokemon.description: It is actually three MAGNEMITE linked by magnetism. A group can set off a magnetic storm.

pokemon.name: FARFETCH
pokemon.description: It can't live without the stalk it holds. That's why it defends the stalk from attackers with its life.

pokemon.name: DODUO
pokemon.description: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

pokemon.name: DODRIO
pokemon.description: When DODUO evolves into this odd breed, one of its heads splits into two. It runs at nearly 40 mph.

pokemon.name: SEEL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.

pokemon.name: DEWGONG
pokemon.description: In snow, the pure white coat covering its body obscures it from predators.

pokemon.name: GRIMER
pokemon.description: It was born when sludge in a dirty stream was exposed to the moon's X-rays. It appears among filth.

pokemon.name: MUK
pokemon.description: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

pokemon.name: SHELLDER
pokemon.description: It swims backward by opening and closing its two shells. Its large tongue is always kept hanging out.

pokemon.name: CLOYSTER
pokemon.description: It fights by keeping its shell tightly shut for protection and by shooting spikes to repel foes.

pokemon.name: GASTLY
pokemon.description: This Pokemon's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.

pokemon.name: HAUNTER
pokemon.description: It can slip through any obstacle. It lurks inside walls to keep an eye on its foes.

pokemon.name: GENGAR
pokemon.description: It hides in shadows. It is said that if GENGAR is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees F.

pokemon.name: ONIX
pokemon.description: When it travels underground, it causes rumbling and tremors. It can move at 50 mph.

pokemon.name: DROWZEE
pokemon.description: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

pokemon.name: HYPNO
pokemon.description: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

pokemon.name: KRABBY
pokemon.description: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.

pokemon.name: KINGLER
pokemon.description: The larger pincer has 10,000- horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

pokemon.name: VOLTORB
pokemon.description: It looks just like a Poke Ball. It is dangerous because it may electrocute or explode on touch.

pokemon.name: ELECTRODE
pokemon.description: It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored Electrity.

pokemon.name: EXEGGCUTE
pokemon.description: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become separated.

pokemon.name: EXEGGUTOR
pokemon.description: It is called "The Walking Jungle." If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an EXEGGCUTE.

pokemon.name: CUBONE
pokemon.description: When it thinks of its dead mother, it cries. Its crying makes the skull it wears rattle hollowly.

pokemon.name: MAROWAK
pokemon.description: From its birth, this savage Pokemon constantly holds bones. It is skilled in using them as weapons.

pokemon.name: HITMONLEE
pokemon.description: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.

pokemon.name: HITMONCHAN
pokemon.description: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

pokemon.name: LICKITUNG
pokemon.description: Instead of hands, it uses its tongue, which is twice its height. Its sticky saliva grips anything.

pokemon.name: KOFFING
pokemon.description: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.

pokemon.name: WEEZING
pokemon.description: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

pokemon.name: RHYHORN
pokemon.description: Its body is clad in a thick hide, and its tackles topple buildings. Unfortunately, it is not smart.

pokemon.name: RHYDON
pokemon.description: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.

pokemon.name: CHANSEY
pokemon.description: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.

pokemon.name: TANGELA
pokemon.description: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.

pokemon.name: KANGASKHAN
pokemon.description: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.

pokemon.name: HORSEA
pokemon.description: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

pokemon.name: SEADRA
pokemon.description: Its spines provide protection. Its fins and bones are prized as traditional medicine ingredients.

pokemon.name: GOLDEEN
pokemon.description: It swims elegantly by flittering its tail fin as if it were a dress. It has the look of a queen.

pokemon.name: SEAKING
pokemon.description: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.

pokemon.name: STARYU
pokemon.description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

pokemon.name: STARMIE
pokemon.description: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

pokemon.name: MR
pokemon.description: It is a pantomime expert that can create invisible but solid walls using miming gestures.

pokemon.name: SCYTHER
pokemon.description: It is nearly impossible to parry its attacking scythes. Its movements are like a ninja's.

pokemon.name: JYNX
pokemon.description: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.

pokemon.name: ELECTABUZZ
pokemon.description: Half of all blackouts occur when this Pokemon appears at power plants and eats Electrity.

pokemon.name: MAGMAR
pokemon.description: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.

pokemon.name: PINSIR
pokemon.description: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

pokemon.name: TAUROS
pokemon.description: Once it takes aim at its foe, it makes a headlong charge. It is famous for its violent nature.

pokemon.name: MAGIKARP
pokemon.description: It is said to be the world's weakest Pokemon. No one knows why it has managed to survive.

pokemon.name: GYARADOS
pokemon.description: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.

pokemon.name: LAPRAS
pokemon.description: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokemon on its back. It understands human speech.

pokemon.name: DITTO
pokemon.description: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.

pokemon.name: EEVEE
pokemon.description: A rare Pokemon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.

pokemon.name: VAPOREON
pokemon.description: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.

pokemon.name: JOLTEON
pokemon.description: It controls 10,000-volt power and can raise all the fur on its body as if it were sharp needles.

pokemon.name: FLAREON
pokemon.description: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.

pokemon.name: PORYGON
pokemon.description: The world's first artificially created Pokemon. It can travel through electronic space.

pokemon.name: OMANYTE
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.

pokemon.name: OMASTAR
pokemon.description: It is thought that this Pokemon became extinct because its spiral shell grew too large.

pokemon.name: KABUTO
pokemon.description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

pokemon.name: KABUTOPS
pokemon.description: It is thought that this Pokemon came onto land because its prey adapted to life on land.

pokemon.name: AERODACTYL
pokemon.description: A Pokemon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

pokemon.name: SNORLAX
pokemon.description: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.

pokemon.name: ARTICUNO
pokemon.description: A legendary bird Pokemon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.

pokemon.name: ZAPDOS
pokemon.description: A legendary Pokemon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: MOLTRES
pokemon.description: One of the legendary bird Pokemon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

pokemon.name: DRATINI
pokemon.description: It is called the "Mirage Pokemon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.

pokemon.name: DRAGONAIR
pokemon.description: If its body takes on an aura, the weather changes instantly. It is said to live in seas and lakes.

pokemon.name: DRAGONITE
pokemon.description: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

pokemon.name: MEWTWO
pokemon.description: A Pokemon created by recombining MEW's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokemon.

pokemon.name: MEW
pokemon.description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe MEW to be the ancestor of Pokemon.
